Sentence 1: Skeletal muscles contract through a complex process involving myofibrils
Sentence 2: Myofibrils are composed of repeating units called sarcomeres

Sentence 1: Myofibrils are composed of repeating units called sarcomeres
Sentence 2: Each sarcomere contains thin filaments of actin and thick filaments of myosin

Sentence 1: Each sarcomere contains thin filaments of actin and thick filaments of myosin
Sentence 2: The contraction begins when the nervous system sends an electrical signal to the muscle

Sentence 1: The contraction begins when the nervous system sends an electrical signal to the muscle
Sentence 2: This signal triggers the release of calcium ions into the sarcoplasm

Sentence 1: This signal triggers the release of calcium ions into the sarcoplasm
Sentence 2: Calcium binds to troponin, a protein associated with the thin filaments

Sentence 1: Calcium binds to troponin, a protein associated with the thin filaments
Sentence 2: This binding changes the shape of tropomyosin, exposing the binding sites on actin

Sentence 1: This binding changes the shape of tropomyosin, exposing the binding sites on actin
Sentence 2: Myosin heads, which are attached to the thick filaments, attach to the exposed actin binding sites

Sentence 1: Myosin heads, which are attached to the thick filaments, attach to the exposed actin binding sites
Sentence 2: The myosin heads then undergo a power stroke, pulling the actin filaments towards the center of the sarcomere

Sentence 1: The myosin heads then undergo a power stroke, pulling the actin filaments towards the center of the sarcomere
Sentence 2: This sliding of filaments shortens the sarcomere, leading to muscle contraction

Sentence 1: This sliding of filaments shortens the sarcomere, leading to muscle contraction
Sentence 2: The contraction ceases when calcium is actively pumped back into the sarcoplasmic reticulum, detaching myosin from actin

Sentence 1: The contraction ceases when calcium is actively pumped back into the sarcoplasmic reticulum, detaching myosin from actin
Sentence 2: The filaments return to their original positions, lengthening the sarcomere and relaxing the muscle

Sentence 1: The filaments return to their original positions, lengthening the sarcomere and relaxing the muscle
Sentence 2: This cycle of contraction and relaxation is how skeletal muscles perform their functions

Sentence 2: The molecular mechanisms of myofibril contraction in skeletal muscles involve a series of precise interactions between actin, myosin, calcium ions, and regulatory proteins
